attributes.additional_details:
Over the last eight years, the English supporters of our great team have been let down time and again by one man. We, the people, would like the government to intervene on our behalf, and ask Wayne Rooney to resign from international football.

Recently, England have shown that they play better without him and he hasn't contributed well to any major game in the past eight years. The team represents England, and Wayne Rooney is sadly lacking.
